name: sheepChat
description: Simple and convenient cross platform multichat capable to satisfy the needs of any streamer. Can display messages from majority of streaming resources and show that information the way YOU want!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or later Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Visual C++ Visual Studio 2015
